emuInput.TitMainTitle: Race Relations Commission members, seated from left: Mrs. William T. Poole, Roland M. Sawyer, and Elizabeth Reed; standing: Rev. James B. Cayce, Rev. Andrew A. Hughey, Rev. Robert C. Steele, and Rev. S. Amos Brackeen, posed behind table, in interior with barrister bookcases and patterned folding screen, another pose
emuInput.CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, February 13, 1954, pg. 26 reads: "Fellowship Service Slated Sunday - These lay and professional religious leaders were among the members of the Race Relations Commission who assisted in planning the sixth annual Fellowship Service to be held at Soldiers and Sailors Memorial Hall next Sunday afternoon, Feb. 14, beginning at 3:30 o'clock. The service, in observance of Race Relations Sunday, will have Dr. W. J .Faulkner of Chicago as the principal speaker.  Shown here making final arrangements are (seated): Mrs. William T. Poole, general chairman; Roland M. Sawyer and Miss Elizabeth Reed.  Behind them are the Rev. James B. Cayce, the Rev. A.A.Hughey, the Rev. Robert C. Steele and the Rev. S. Amos Brackeen. - Harris Photo."
